summary: Any hair pack on any race/gender except for beast. Video tutorial.
descriptionHtml:
Video Link: 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z35N40jF0Qs

Step 1) download desired hair pack(s)
Step 2) open .esm file from creator kit
Step 3) type in mod name or manually search for modded hairstyle (i.e. apachi -----> all ------> apachihair01)
Step 4) open desired hairstyle file(s) and check the unisex option and select the \"open to all races except for beast\" bar
Step 5) Save file as same name as original except with the word unisex at the end
Step 6) launch skyrim and click data files
Step 7) uncheck the original .esm and .esp mods and find the mod you created
Step 8) play! all hairs will be available to all races except beast, regardless of gender

Good for improved male hair or trolling!

Added image of retextured clothes. If anyone likes it I\'ll try to upload it.
author: me
